TEXT.TITLE: JAMES RIVER <JR> TO REBUILD PAPER MACHINE
TEXT.BODY: James River Corp said it will rebuild its Number Three paper machine at the Wauna pulp and paper mill near Clatskanie, Ore., at a cost of about 31.8 mln dlrs to significantly improve newsprint quality and expand its uncoated groundwood specialties paper product line. It said completion is expected in late 1988. Reuter
